page.title: 10NEW ROMNEY CANON L.P.FORD
page.content: I HAVE BEEN REVEREND AT ST NICHOLAS'S NEARLY 14 YEARS.LAST YEAR ABOUT 2000 TOURISTS SIGNED THE VISITORS BOOK.THE TOURISTS ARE MOST IMPRESSED WITH THE OLDER PARTS OF THE CHURCH.THE OLDEST IS THE NAVE WITH ITS LARGE PILLARS AND LOW ARCHES.THE HIGHER ARCHES ARE EARLY ENGLISH AS AGAINST THE OLDER NORMAN ARCHITECTURE.THE TOWER IS ALSO VERY POPULAR,OF WHICH A GOOD HALF IS NORMAN. CHANGES HAVE TAKEN PLACE MUCH RESTORATION WORK ,WHILE THE TOWER FOUNDATIONS HAVE BEEN SUPPORTED,SEATING IMPROVED AND THE OLD ELECTRIC ORGAN REPLACED.VANDALS SADLY HAVE BEEN A PROBLEM SLOGANS WRITTEN, ,PAINT SPRAYING, BROKEN PEW DOORS, ,FIRES TO HASSOCKS AND PRAYER BOOKS.WE NOW ARE FORCED TO KEEP THE CHURCH CLOSED WHEN IT IS NOT IN USE.
